abce.ecj
Class GroupedEvaluator.GroupedEvaluatorAssistant

java.lang.Object
  abce.ecj.GroupedEvaluator.GroupedEvaluatorAssistant
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable<EvalThreadStats>
Enclosing class:
GroupedEvaluator
 class GroupedEvaluator.GroupedEvaluatorAssistant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<EvalThreadStats>

The GroupedEvaluatorAssistant contains eval thread specific information about the individuals and problems that need to be evaluated. Each assistant runs in its own thread.

Author:
ruppmatt

Constructor Detail

GroupedEvaluator.GroupedEvaluatorAssistant

public GroupedEvaluator.GroupedEvaluatorAssistant(ec.EvolutionState state,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<EvaluationGroup> groups,
                                                  int threadnum,
                                                  CallableGroupProblemForm prob,
                                                  long timeout)
Parameters:
state - The evolution state (should not be modified)
groups - A queue of groups of individuals that need to be evaluated
threadnum - ECJ thread number
prob - The problem to evaluate
timeout - The maximum time the evaluator should wait for a problem to finish.
